# Assignment 10 - Complete The Code

### Task
Add one line of code under the **Add Your Code Here** comment, without writing any numbers by your hands to get result **300**.

---

### Provided Code 
```cpp
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
  // Do Not Edit Below
  int a, b, c = 100;

  // Add Your Code Here


  // Do Not Edit Below
  cout << a + b + c; // 300
  return 0;
}
```
